name: Knife of the Living Dead
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: **Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- Remove a Zombie token adjacent to the target; if you do, gain +1 ::gold_attack:: Attack.

name: Shallow Graves
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
Before the attack: **Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- Remove a Zombie token adjacent to the target; if you do, gain +1 ::gold_attack:: Attack.

name: Awaken!
text: Place up to 4 ::token_zombie:: Zombie tokens into spaces adjacent to you, or into spawn points in radius. Zombie tokens are not removed at the end of round.

name: Crawling Dead
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **Choose one —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- Another enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a Zombie token, discards a card, if able.

name: Corpse Slam
text:
**Choose one —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range up to 1 space; that Zombie token may push a unit or token adjacent to it 1 space.
- Move 1 space.

name: Stage Dive
text:
**Choose one —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range 1 space.
- Swap with a Zombie token in range.

name: Walking Dead
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- Another enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a Zombie token, discards a card, if able; each enemy hero can only be targeted once.

name: Braains...!
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: **Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- If an enemy hero in radius is adjacent to a Zombie token, retrieve a discarded card.

name: Racing Dead
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- Another enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a Zombie token, discards a card, if able; each enemy hero can only be targeted once.

name: Braaaaaaaains...!
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: **Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in radius 1 space.
- If an enemy hero in radius is adjacent to a Zombie token, retrieve a discarded card.

name: Morbid Mosh
text:
**Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range up to 1 space; that Zombie token may push a unit or token adjacent to it 1 space.
- Move 1 space.

name: Robbing Zombies
text:
**Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range up to 1 space. Gain 1 coin.
- Move 1 space.

name: Macabre Mayhem
text:
**Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range up to 1 space; that Zombie token may push a unit or token adjacent to it 1 space.
- Move 1 space.

name: Stalking Scalpers
text:
**Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range up to 1 space. Gain 1 coin.
- Move 1 space.

name: Crowd Drift
text:
**Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range 1 space.
- Swap with a Zombie token in range.

name: Gathering Horde
text:
**Choose up to two times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range 1 space.
- Once per turn: Replace an enemy minion in range adjacent to two or more Zombie tokens with a Zombie token.

name: Crowd Surf
text:
**Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range 1 space.
- Swap with a Zombie token in range.

name: Army of Darkness
text:
**Choose up to three times —**
- Move a ::token_zombie:: Zombie token in range 1 space.
- Once per turn: Replace an enemy minion in range adjacent to two or more Zombie tokens with a Zombie token.

name: Master of Puppets
text: Whenever you would choose up to three times, you may choose up to five times instead.
